about.title: About
about.description: I have been working with web development for 1 year and I have experience in the development of web applications using Javascript, React, NextJs, Html, Css, TailwindCss, Bootstrap, and other technologies.
about.title-2: My name is Brian and I am a Frontend Developer from Chile
